comments: Dr. Farley is a great professor. She makes her lectures interesting, and gives ongoing feedback so you can really learn what you need to learn. There is a fair amount of work for the class, but she is very clear on what is expected, so there are no surprises.

comments: Does not provide her slides online, so make sure you take notes. Clear and organized lectures. Provides study guides for all exams. Wants you to succeed so she\'s really good at re wording and explaining things until you get it

comments: Take good notes, test are really hard. She grade tough as well. It\'s best to never miss a class you will need the points.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Dr,Farley is by far one of the best instructors at UB currently.She challenges you to pay attention and remain attentive in class but also makes her lectures interesting.The class was fun and I loved every minute of it. Yes, you do have to study but she gives you a study guide and the lectures are what is on the tests.

comments: She is very good, helpful, and knows what\'s she talking about.. He test are hard, she ask concept questions, so studying is very important..

comments: She made stats easy to understand by explaining it in english rather than in so much psych jargon. She uses a lot of real world examples to relate what she is teaching.

Clear grading criteria (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I had her for intermediate stats for Behavioral Sciences. This was her 1st semester teaching at UB. She makes the material VERY easy to understand. She\'s also helpful and gives reasonable assignments. She won\'t overload you with work like other professors but gives you assignments that actually aid your understanding.
